languages.text: "Я ценю вашу демонстрацию лояльности {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}. Приблизив к себе на церемонии члена святого ордена, вы показали, что мыслите себя {mf|сыном|дочерью} в лоне нашей благочестивой организации".

traits.locale_text: "Я ценю вашу демонстрацию лояльности Империуму. Приблизив к себе на церемонии члена нашей организации, вы показали, что мыслите себя {mf|сыном|дочерью} в лоне нашей благочестивой организации".
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."
languages.original_text: "Я ценю вашу демонстрацию лояльности {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империуму{/g}. Приблизив к себе на церемонии члена святого ордена, вы показали, что мыслите себя {mf|сыном|дочерью} в лоне нашей благочестивой организации".

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the Imperium. By having one of our members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you think yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organization."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the Imperium. By having one of our members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you think yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organization."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}への忠誠心には感謝しております。式典の間、聖なる宗団メンバーのひとりがお側にいましたな、つまり陛下は、我ら敬けんな組織の{mf|息子|娘}という自覚を示されたのですね」
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}への忠誠心には感謝しております。式典の間、聖なる宗団メンバーのひとりがお側にいましたな、つまり陛下は、我ら敬けんな組織の{mf|息子|娘}という自覚を示されたのですね」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “我很欣赏你对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠诚。在那场典礼上，你允许神圣审判庭的成员陪伴在你身边，这意味着你将自己视为神圣审判庭的子女。”
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."

traits.locale_text: “我很欣赏你对{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的忠诚。在那场典礼上，你允许神圣审判庭的成员陪伴在你身边，这意味着你将自己视为神圣审判庭的子女。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Agradezco su muestra de lealtad al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Al tener a un miembro de uno de los Santos Ordos a su lado durante la ceremonia, demuestra que se considera un{mf||a} hij{mf|o|a} en el seno de nuestra organización».
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."

traits.locale_text: «Agradezco su muestra de lealtad al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Al tener a un miembro de uno de los Santos Ordos a su lado durante la ceremonia, demuestra que se considera un{mf||a} hij{mf|o|a} en el seno de nuestra organización».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « En invitant un membre du Saint Ordo à se tenir à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, vous avez non seulement attesté de votre loyauté envers l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, mais également démontré que vous vous considérez comme {mf|un fils|une fille} de notre vénérable organisation. Je n'y suis pas insensible. »
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."

traits.locale_text: « En invitant un membre du Saint Ordo à se tenir à vos côtés pendant la cérémonie, vous avez non seulement attesté de votre loyauté envers l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}, mais également démontré que vous vous considérez comme {mf|un fils|une fille} de notre vénérable organisation. Je n'y suis pas insensible. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Ich weiß die Demonstration Eurer Loyalität gegenüber dem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} zu schätzen. Durch ein Mitglied der heiligen Ordo an Eurer Seite während der Zeremonie habt Ihr gezeigt, dass Ihr Euch als {mf|Sohn|Tochter}im Schoß unserer verehrten Organisation betrachtet."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß die Demonstration Eurer Loyalität gegenüber dem {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} zu schätzen. Durch ein Mitglied der heiligen Ordo an Eurer Seite während der Zeremonie habt Ihr gezeigt, dass Ihr Euch als {mf|Sohn|Tochter}im Schoß unserer verehrten Organisation betrachtet."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'a{/g} sadakatini sergilemeni takdir ettim. Tören sırasında Kutsal Nizam'ın bir mensubuna yanında yer vererek kendini, hürmetkâr teşkilatımızın bir evladı olarak gördüğünü göstermiş oldun."
languages.original_text: "I appreciate your display of loyalty to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. By having one of the Holy Ordo's members at your side during the ceremony, you have demonstrated that you consider yourself a {mf|son|daughter} in the fold of our reverent organisation."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'a sadakatinizi sergilemenizi takdir ettim. Tören sırasında Kutsal Birlik üyelerinden birinizin yanınızda durmasıyla, kendinizi hürmetkâr teşkilatımızın bir evladı olarak gördüğünüzü göstermiş oldunuz."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor
